markdownRemark.html: Hi world, my name is Rahat and I'm an aspiring Full Stack Web Developer. Is aspiring the right word? I hope it is because I'm not going to change it now, I like the way it sounds too much. I created this blog from scratch using React, GraphQL, and Gatsby. Prior to me starting to work on this blog I had zero experience with GraphQL and Gatsby and had only ever made one React component. So it was definitely a learning experience with a lot of "oh f**k's".

frontmatter.title: Rahat Codes Introduction Again
